name: WildFHIRCER4Responder
title: WildFHIR Community Edition R4 Responder
description: WildFHIR Community Edition R4 Responder actor
documentation: An application or product that responds to a custom operation request conformant to the AEGIS WildFHIR Community Edition R4 IG. This can be thought of as the server in a client-server interaction.
